column4: Sorry about that, but I've got an issue with the 8.10 Beta, as well as all of the 8.10 Alphas

So, would this be the room to talk about an issue with Ubuntu 8.10? Or could someone point me in the right direction... I'm sorry, but I'm stuck on irssi for the time being, and /list shows tooooo many channels for me to hunt down.
